You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017
I work within the information Security and Access Management department helping to integrate applications into the Access Managements team, including data clean-up and implementing security controls.

Within Information Security, I worked in Identity Access Management managing and coordinating activities pertaining to the re-engineering project's direction, resource assignments, project health, and reporting.  Additionally, the operational process I managed involved monitoring and controlling the level of access 8,000+ IT Contractors had to confidential information and processes within American Express for standard business operations.  The goal with this Contractor Monitoring program was to grow the process so that it could be expanded to all of American Express Technologies.  Since being added to the team, I have be able to re-engineer processes within the program and grow the contractor base by 37%.

Managed a three phase re-branding project for the small local business, Health Solutions for LIFE.  The objective was to analyze and re-align the organizations brand with it's goals and purpose.  This included a plan for effectively re-designing the physical interior of the office, developing and implementing business systems into the organization and optimizing information storage, maintenance, and databasing.Managed project by following the PMI framework, including but not limited to:- Collecting requirements- Defining and controlling scope- Defining activities- Creating a Schedule- Determining and controlling budget- Managing communications and stakeholders on the project
Executive Team leader in Guest Experience

Leading a direct team of approximately 50 people with 5 leaders, I managed the execution of time sensitive product releases, all staffing needs and training, team development for both poor performance and great performance, maximized productivity, and drove profitable sales through customer retention strategies and well developed leadership skills.  As a result of my customer retention strategies and leaderships skills, I led a:- 15 consecutive months of meeting payroll goals by tracking and managing resources on a minimum of month-to-month if not more often depending on the the risk- Increased total payroll productivity by 11% in the last six months by ensuring accurate operational execution and effective coaching and performance development conversations and follow-up- Increased the percent of associates exceeding their sales goals from 9% to 20% - Decreased the percent of under performing associates from 29% to 9%- 26% sales increase YTD

I managed the day to day operations of a large retail establishment with a focus on driving profitable sales and maximizing sales potential.  This was accomplished through:- Keeping records of and monitoring purchases, sales, requisitions, customer service, and product quality.  - Audited all store operations to ensure team members were consistently operating according to company policies and best practices. Provided coaching and suggested corrective actions accordingly. - Collaborated with leaders and peers to develop and establish strategies to increase sales and productivity in response to the audit. - Established and implemented new policies, goals, objectives, and procedures for all departments in order to increase payroll productivity.  All operational areas increased productivity ranging from 7% - 21%. - Directing and supervising employees engaged in sales, inventory management, cash management, or in performing services for customers, assigning employees to specific duties in order to maximize productivity, ensuring timely follow up for results and accountability.- Instructing staff on how to handle difficult and complicated sales and assign employees to specific operational duties.

I am so thankful to have had the opportunity to work with Christina. She is by no means your average leader. Upon first meeting her it was clear that she is passionate, energetic, and up-beat. She always manages to have such a positive and respectful manner about her that it is easy for anyone to relate to her and want to listen to what she has to say. In working with Christina, several things about her become obvious: - An influential, positive attitude that strongly contributes to her talent for relationship building.- Flexible and able to adapt to any necessary changes to better the team and the organization. - Driven and dedicated. You begin to realize that she operates with true transparency and that she really does care about her team and the cause. Christina takes ownership of the tasks at hand and sees them through to completion. She is a respected professional within her field.

summary: Results driven, high energy project leader pursuing experience in Information Security and Technology in the greater Phoenix area.  I have a dream to lead technology initiatives and aligning technology services with business objectives, delivering tangible results and achieving complete customer satisfaction.I am a solutions architect with 3+ years of proven ability to successfully direct small-scale projects in various industries.  Over the years, I have demonstrated the ability to create a cohesive, motivational work environment that is inspirational to cross-functional partners and project members.  I am dedicated to the team and keep close to the scope of work to ensure the growth of the company i.e. increasing profits, decreasing costs, and developing business relationships.  There are two main skills that allow me to be successful and add value to the organization: 1) Strong and developed interpersonal skills, and 2) Meticulously methodical analytic skills.As a project manager, some of the strong interpersonal skills I exercise are:- Communicating effectively- Tactful relationship building and diplomacy- Capturing the team's engagement and inspiring their individual involvement- Being a champion of change and adapting to all situations and business needs- Conflict mitigation and resolutionIn addition to my interpersonal abilities, I am also innately skilled at:- Finance management- Organizing and prioritizing tasks and plans- Problem prevention and resolution- Budgeting and resource allocation- Data analysisolsencm1@gmail.com
